testcase.classname: Create Delete Bookmark Feature using DocString
testcase.name: Create and delete bookmark using DocString
testcase.system-out: Given browser is "chrome"...................................................passed Given user navigates to the Box App.........................................passed Then user verify the "Box | Login" in the app...............................passed When user enter the correct "gujral608@gmail.com" and "Welcome@1234" and Login to the app.passed Then user verify the "All Files | Powered by Box" in the app................passed When user creates a new bookmark with url "www.random.com"..................passed And user enters the bookmark description as:................................passed Then user verifies the following success message:...........................passed When user deletes a bookmark................................................passed Then user verifies the "Item successfully moved to trash." deletion message.passed When user logout of the application.........................................passed Then user verify the "Box | Login" in the app...............................passed
